ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would recommend this class to another student. The course is an excellent way to learn about foundational models in foreign policy decision-making. The situation in Ukraine has implications for the world order and a deep dive into the topic is helpful for understanding a range of current events in foreign affairs.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course helped me understand some of the key decision-making models, through both classic texts and contemporary sources. The course also helped me understand international politics better through the lens of the crisis in Ukraine.
